entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 km/h this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 23.
